summary: Comprehensive testing of MarketPulse AI market analysis platform completed. Backend APIs 90.9% functional, frontend UI/UX excellent with successful user registration, authentication, and core workflows.

flaky_endpoints.impact: Users may experience delays when generating AI reports
flaky_endpoints.note: Expected behavior due to GPT-5.2 AI processing time

design_issues.note: Functional but shows console warnings about chart dimensions

passed_tests: Landing page loads with pricing section
User registration flow - creates new account successfully
Dashboard loads and displays stats correctly
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Analyses, Opportunities, Reports)
Analysis creation form opens and accepts input
Analysis creation API with AI insights
